These include Carbon dioxide (CO2), Methane (CH4), Nitrous Oxide (N2O), Sulphur hexafluoride
(SF6), Nitrogen trifluoride (NF3), Hydrofluorocarbons (HFCs), Perfluorocarbons (PFCs)’.
ESRS E1 paragraph 8 states: ‘Ozone-depleting substances (ODS), nitrogen oxides (NOX) and
sulphur oxides (SOX), among other air emissions, are connected to climate change but are
